item.description:
Please join us for an extraordinary afternoon
On the lawn at the Larches Inn, welcoming Dr. Eva Selhub, M.D.

"Dr. Eva Selhub, M.D. shows how, through very precise biological
mechanisms, love heal us. Read this book and heal yourself"
- Deepak Chopra

The Love Response
Neutralize the physical effects of stress
Turn off anger, fear, and anxiety
Restore balance and well being

You will learn tools for coping better,thinking more clearly,
becoming more creative, and for turning obstacles into
opportunities for success.

Book signing immediately following the presentation.
Books will be for sale or bring your own copy

RSVP by May 20th
For more information on Dr. Eva Selhub, M.D. visit www.loveresponse.com


In addition, Dr. Eva Selhub, M.D. will be at
Kirpalu July 31 - Aug 2 and Omega October 23 - 25.
Visit www.kripalu.org or www.eomega.org
item.name: The Love Response - Dr. Eva Selhub, M.D.
